arts.ttl: Thomas Frank is confident Tottenham can score against Arsenal
arts.sum: Arsenal’s defence has earned widespread recognition this season for being one of the most disciplined and resilient units in world football, and Tottenham will attempt to challenge that strength when both clubs meet this weekend. The Gunners have produced consistently commanding defensive performances and have secured impressive results against every opponent they have faced.
